name: Barcelona Supercomputing Center- Centro Nacional de Supercomputaci√≥n
goal: The BSC-CNS is the Spanish centre of supercomputing for cross-disciplinary use, at the service of the national scientific and technical community and public and private entities to promote international collaboration and connected via communications networks to other centres and entities in its field.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
BSC is part of the steering board of the ETP 4HPC, the European Technology Platform for High Performance Computing.
BSC is partecipating in several H2020 projects and activities, mainly within the ICT workprogramme, FET-HPC, Climate Change, Energy
